references.paper_title: Larabench: Benchmarking arabic ai with large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset for evaluating Arabic AI models, which is highly relevant to the current research on Arabic OCR and document understanding.
This technical report provides details about GPT-4, a large language model that is used as a baseline in the benchmark, and helps in understanding its performance capabilities.

references.paper_title: Peacock: A family of arabic multimodal large language models and benchmarks
references.reason: This paper presents a family of Arabic multimodal large language models, which are compared against traditional OCR systems in the benchmark, providing insights into modern VLM performance.
This paper introduces Docling, a document conversion pipeline that includes OCR and layout detection capabilities and is compared against other pipelines in the benchmark evaluation.

references.paper_title: Qalam: A multimodal llm for arabic optical character and handwriting recognition
references.reason: This paper presents Qalam, another multimodal LLM specifically designed for Arabic OCR and handwriting recognition which is helpful in the comparative analysis of VLM performance against traditional OCR approaches.
